examples: the afternoon when the disturbance happened
synonyms: supervene; informalgo down; formaleventuate; literarycome to pass
betide "remember what happened last time he was here"

definitions.definition: ensue as an effect or result of an action or event.
examples: this is what happens when the mechanism goes wrong

definitions.definition: chance to do something or come about.
examples: we just happened to meet Paul
synonyms: hit on "she happened on a blue jay's nest"

examples: it just so happened that she turned up that afternoon
synonyms: have the good/bad luck "they happened to be in"

definitions.definition: find or come across by chance.
examples: Mike played football as a boy and happened on cycling by accident

definitions.definition: used as a polite formula in questions.
examples: do you happen to know who her doctor is?
the same thing happened to me
I don't care what happens to the money
synonyms: betide "I wonder what happened to Joe?"
